component.name: FlClash
component.summary: A multi-platform proxy client based on ClashMeta

description.p: A multi-platform proxy client based on ClashMeta, simple and easy to use, open-source and ad-free.

ul.li: Multi-platform: Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Adaptive multiple screen sizes, Multiple color themes available
Based on Material You Design, Surfboard-like UI

description.p: Due to the well-established restrictions of sandbox, some features are not available for now. Such as TUN Mode...
